snippet: The timing of the announcement would position him ahead of his potential Republican rivals and allow him to begin raising money directly for his campaign 10 months before the Iowa caucuses.
abstract: Sen Rand Paul of Kentucky plans to announce his 2016 presidential bid on April 7, move that will place him ahead of other Republican contenders and allow him to begin fundraising.
lead_paragraph: The timing of the announcement would position him ahead of his potential Republican rivals and allow him to begin raising money directly for his campaign 10 months before the Iowa caucuses.

headline.main: Rand Paul Is Looking to April to Announce Plan to Run for President, Associates Say
headline.print_headline: Paul Is Looking to April to Announce Plan to Run for President, Associates Say
